FILTER.FILTER_HELP: Compute a set of topological measures over a mesh.

FILTER.filterName: Compute Topological Measures for Quad Meshes
FILTER.FILTER_HELP: Compute a set of geometric measures over a mesh.
Compute a set of geometric measures over a mesh. It computes: bounding box volume and diagonal, surface area, thin shell barycenter, and an Inertia Matrix. Open the layer dialog to see the results.
Compute some aggregate statistics over the per vertex quality, like Min, Max, Average, StdDev and Variance.
Compute some aggregate statistics over the per vertex quality, like Min, Max, Average, StdDev and Variance.
Compute an histogram of the values of the per-vertex quality.

PARAM.PARAM_HELP: The vertex are displaced of a vector whose norm is bounded by this value
The vertex are displaced of a vector whose norm is bounded by this value
The number of bins of the histogram. E.g. the number of intervals in which the min..max range is subdivided into.

FILTER.FILTER_HELP: Compute an histogram of the values of the per-vertex quality.

PARAM.PARAM_HELP: The vertex are displaced of a vector whose norm is bounded by this value
The vertex are displaced of a vector whose norm is bounded by this value
The number of bins of the histogram. E.g. the number of intervals in which the min..max range is subdivided into.
